info.description: These services manage all of the common commerce functionality, and also include customizations from installed AddOns. The implementing extension is called commercewebservices.

patch.description: Updates a product configuration. It's possible to send only the changed parts of the configuration, for example a single value change for an attribute. These changes must include their entire path through the configuration (the group they belong to and its parent groups)

get.summary: Get component data
get.description:
Finds cms components by the specified IDs. When none is provided, this will retrieve all components
The components list will be filtered by the given catalog, product or category restrictions, as well as by the pagination information. The result will be sorted in the specified order.

parameters.name: baseSiteId
parameters.description: Base site identifier

parameters.name: catalogCode
parameters.description: Catalog code

parameters.name: categoryCode
parameters.description: Category code

parameters.name: componentIds
parameters.description: List of Component identifiers

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: Optional pagination parameter. Default value 0.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Optional pagination parameter. Default value 10.

parameters.name: productCode
parameters.description: Product code

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional sort criterion. No default value.

get.summary: Get page data with a list of cms content slots
get.description:
Get page data with a list of cms content slots based on pageLabelOrId or code. If none is provided then this will retrieve a Homepage cms content slots.
Content pages can be filtered by pageLabelOrId while the rest of the page types can be filtered by the code.

parameters.name: baseSiteId
parameters.description: Base site identifier

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: If pageType is ProductPage, code should be product code; if pageType is CategoryPage, code should be category code; if pageType is CatalogPage, code should be catalog code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration (list of fields, which should be returned in response)

parameters.name: pageLabelOrId
parameters.description: Page Label or Id; if no page has a label that matches the provided label exactly, try to find pages whose label starts with a section of the provided label. Otherwise, try to find the page by id. Note: URL encoding on the page label should be applied when the label contains special characters

parameters.name: pageType
parameters.description: Page type

parameters.name: groupId

get.summary: Get a list of product exports.
get.description: Used for product export. Depending on the timestamp parameter, it can return all products or only products modified after the given time.

parameters.name: baseSiteId
parameters.description: Base site identifier

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog to retrieve products from. The catalog must be provided along with the version.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: The current result page requested.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results returned per page.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: When this parameter is set, only products modified after the given time will be returned. This parameter should be in ISO-8601 format (for example, 2018-01-09T16:28:45+0000).

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The catalog version. The catalog version must be provided along with the catalog.

get.summary: Get a list of orders with status updates.
get.description: Returns the orders that have changed status. Returns only the elements from the current baseSite that have been updated after the provided timestamp.

parameters.name: baseSiteId
parameters.description: Base site identifier

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Response configuration. This is the list of fields that should be returned in the response body. Examples: BASIC, DEFAULT, FULL

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Only items newer than the given parameter are retrieved. This parameter should be in ISO-8601 format (for example, 2018-01-09T16:28:45+0000).

post.summary: Verify the decision of the Merchant
post.description:
Verifies the decision of the merchant. 

Note, the Try it out button is not enabled for this method (always returns an error) because the Merchant Callback Controller handles parameters differently, depending on which payment provider is used. For more information about this controller, please refer to the acceleratorocc AddOn documentation on help.hybris.com.

parameters.name: baseSiteId
parameters.description: Base site identifier

post.summary: Verify the decision of the Merchant for a cart
post.description:
Verifies the decision of the merchant for a specified cart, and stores information of the PaymentSubscriptionResult for the cart. 

Note, the Try it out button is not enabled for this method (always returns an error) because the Merchant Callback Controller handles parameters differently, depending on which payment provider is used. For more information about this controller, please refer to the acceleratorocc AddOn documentation on help.hybris.com.

parameters.description: User identifier or one of the literals : 'current' for currently authenticated user, 'anonymous' for anonymous user

code.description: The identifier of the Voucher. This is the first part of voucher code which holds first 3 letters, like: 123

freeShipping.description: Specifies if the order this voucher is applied to is shipped for free (true) or not (false). Defaults to false.

value.description: Value of the voucher. Example of such value is: 15.0d

valueString.description: The value of the voucher to display. Example: 15.0%

currentPage.description: The current page number. The first page is number zero (0), the second page is number one (1), and so on

pageSize.description: The number of results per page. A page may have less results if there are less than a full page of results, only on the last page in the results

totalPages.description: The total number of pages. This is the number of pages, each of pageSize, required to display the totalResults.

totalResults.description: The total number of matched results across all pages

deprecatedPagination.description: Representation of a search results pagination

reason.description: Additional classification specific for each error type e.g. 'noStock'.

subject.description: Identifier of the related object e.g. '1'.

subjectType.description: Type of the object related to the error e.g. 'entry'.

enabled.description: if true, the channel is on; if false, the channel is off

value.description: the corresponding value of current channel, for example, for SMS it should be a mobile number; for email it should be an email address

visible.description: if true, the channel is visible; if false, the channel is invisible

count.description: Number of elements on this page

hasNext.description: Indicates if there is next page

hasPrevious.description: Indicates if there is previous page

notificationType.description: notification type used for this message
